Author: LittleBookOfSorrows
Text: I want to do this.  The battery went in mine some time ago and I didn't bother looking out for the lithium battery I needed.  It was amazing to not be jumping on the thing all the time.  You've given me something to think about.  **Good luck!**  Scale addiction's a tough one, but I remember being okay with it after being scaleless for a week.  &#x200B;  (Fun fact, it was my ED psychologist who told me to start weighing myself once a week when I dropped out of therapy to make sure I wasn't losing weight.  Ugh thanks for that).

Author: Pinkatoki
Text: Very proud of you! This is a huge step toward happiness ðŸ’•
